Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Helpful for clarifying topics when not understood when explained by a teacher, helpful to synthesise a lot of information quickly and able to ask multiple follow on questions about topics and structure my learning better which all leads to saving time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I guess feedback from GenAI feels more non-biased coming from a computer.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Time availability and email response times of teachers/tutors compared to AI means AI is more accessible.
